--- title: Omeka S Tools keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Tools for working with data in an instance of Omeka S" description: "Tools for working with data in an instance of Omeka S" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install omeka-s-tools

How to use

See the documentation.

{% raw %} 
omeka = OmekaAPIClient('http://timsherratt.org/collections/api')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
items = omeka.get_resources('items')
items['total_results']

49
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
items['results'][0]
